diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $XB$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $XC$ is $13$ units.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The line $XB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
The length of the line $YE$ is $x$ units.
The length of the line $YF$ is $6.5$ units.
Point $E$ lies on the line connecting $F$ and $G$.
The line $YE$ is perpendicular to the line $EF$.
The measure of angle $BCX$ is equal to the measure of angle $EFY$.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BD$, $CD$, forming a triangle $BCD$.
There are lines $EF$, $EG$, $FG$, forming a triangle $EFG$.
There are lines $XB$, $XC$, $XD$, forming a triangle $XBC$.
There are lines $YE$, $YF$, $YG$, forming a triangle $YEF$.
